command.name: account_info
command.desc: Returns information about the given account.

argument.name: account
argument.desc: The account you are interested in.

result.name: Balance
result.desc: The number of stellars this account holds , in stroops.

result.name: OwnerCount
result.desc: The number of offers and trust lines created by this account. Useful for calculating the account's reserve.

result.name: PreviousTxnID
result.desc: The Transaction ID of the last transaction creatd by this account.

result.name: PreviousTxnLgrSeq
result.desc: The ledger sequence number this account's last transaction appeared in.

result.name: Sequence
result.desc: The current transaction sequence number of this account.

result.name: index
result.desc: The index in the ledger of this account entry.
